siminov.orm.database.design
Interface IQueryBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryBuilder
public interface IQueryBuilder

Exposes API's to build database queries.

formCreateTableQuery

java.lang.String formCreateTableQuery(java.lang.String tableName,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> columnNames,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> columnTypes,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> defaultValues,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> checks,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> primaryKeys,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Boolean> isNotNull,
                                      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> uniqueColumns,
                                      java.lang.String foreignKeys)
Build query to create table.

Parameters:
tableName - Name of table.
columnNames - Name of columns.
columnTypes - Type of columns.
defaultValues - Default value of columns.
checks - Check condition of columns.
primaryKeys - Primary Keys of table.
isNotNull - Not Null fields of table.
uniqueColumns - Unique Columns of table.
foreignKeys - Foreign Keys of table.
Returns:
Generated Query.

                                 java.lang.String whichOrderBy,
                                 java.lang.String limit)
Build query to fetch data from table.

Parameters:
tableName - Name of table.
distinct - Distinct TRUE/FALSE.
whereClause - Where clause based on which data will be fetched from table.
columnNames - Name of columns.
groupBys - Group by value.
having - Having clause
orderBy - Order By value.
limit - Limit of data fetched from table.
Returns:
Generated Query.
